name: AMID EVIL - Official Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Champions prepare your ear holes! Andrew Hulshult's latest masterpiece, the AMID EVIL OST!

Track Listing

01 - The Gateway
02 - False Prophets
03 - Numinous
04 - Time Vacuum
05 - Luna Umbrae_Sol Tenebris
06 - Grievance
07 - Distilled Chaos
08 - Somber Mythology
09 - Nefarious
10 - Obelisk
11 - Cutlass
12 - Astral Rejection
13 - Whirling Death
14 - Eventide
15 - Lemniscate
16 - Dura Apogee
17 - Vox in ventum
18 - Corrosion
19 - Disintegration
20 - GodKiller
21 - Aetheres
22 - Arcane Dirge
23 - Aenigmata
24 - Brothers of the Void
25 - Aerugino
26 - Evorsus
27 - Achlys
28 - Finality
29 - Heaven

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A Dank One
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 / AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A Really Dank One
